text:
@CNN At some point will somebody in this Godawful #WhiteHouse communicate to these people they are NOT being brave or hard-working, just #Irresponsible? Not taking #Coronavirus seriously & lack of learning curve has led to catastrophic LOSS OF LIFE. 
@VP should be ashamed of himself
